title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 performance: Architecture, design, and optimization (STG335)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 性能：架构、设计与优化 (STG335)
abstract: Go behind the scenes of Amazon S3 performance architecture while learning practical optimization strategies. We'll explore how S3's internal systems manage massive throughput, handle concurrent requests, and balance loads across its distributed infrastructure. Dive deep into the technical foundations - from request routing and partitioning strategies to caching mechanisms - that enable S3 to power demanding workloads like real-time analytics and ML training. You'll learn how to leverage this architectural understanding to make informed storage class selections, implement performance-enhancing patterns, and design applications that maximize S3's capabilities.
abstract_cn: 深入了解 Amazon S3 性能架构的幕后机制，同时学习实用的优化策略。我们将探讨 S3 的内部系统如何管理海量吞吐量、处理并发请求以及在其分布式基础设施中平衡负载。深入研究技术基础——从请求路由和分区策略到缓存机制——这些技术使 S3 能够支持实时分析和机器学习训练等高要求工作负载。您将学习如何利用这种架构理解来做出明智的存储类选择、实施性能增强模式，并设计能够最大化发挥 S3 能力的应用程序。

presenter.name: Devabrat Kumar
presenter.title: Principal Product Manager Technical - External Services
